sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import {Table,Button} from 'semantic-ui-react';

 export const EditRow = ({item,save,cancel,onChange}) =>{
 return(
     <Table.Row>
         <Table.Cell>(
             <input type = "text" name = "firstname" onChange ={onChange()} value={item.firstname}></input>
         </Table.Cell>
         <Table.Cell>(
             <input type = "text" name = "lastname" onChange ={onChange()} value={item.lastname}></input>
         </Table.Cell>
         <Table.Cell>(
             <input type = "text" name = "address" onChange ={onChange()} value={item.address}></input>
         </Table.Cell>
         <Table.Cell>(
             <input type = "email" name = "email" onChange ={onChange()} value={item.email}></input>
         </Table.Cell>
         <Table.Cell>(
             <input type = "text" name = "phone" onChange ={onChange()} value={item.phone}></input>
         </Table.Cell>
         <Table.Cell>
             <Button onClick={save(item.id)} style={{backgroundColor:"green"}}>Save</Button>        
         </Table.Cell>
         <Table.Cell>
             <Button onClick={()=>cancel()} style={{backgroundColor:"red"}}>Cancel</Button>        
         </Table.Cell>
     </Table.Row>
 )
}

export default EditRow;
